name: Desire Den VR
detailed_description:
Desire Den is a Virtual Reality experience focused on gawking smutty anthro creatures. Why? Well. For your pleasure, of course ;>


Desire Den will feature :


-Full Roomscale Locomotion for VR. Walk around and gawk to your desire

-Interactable objects and characters for VR. Pick up that can

-Easter Eggs and cool secrets. Maybe a dragon egg or two.

-Physical naughty bits. Slap em if you see em.

-Constant updates. We're gonna keep this party going

short_description: Desire Den is a Virtual Reality experience focused on gawking smutty anthro creatures. Why? Well.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480, equivalent or better.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480, equivalent or better.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes depictions of graphic sexual acts and full nudity.
